import React from 'react'; export const PrivacyPolicy = () => (

PRIVACY POLICY

Last Updated: September 15, 2019

Contents

  • 1. Overview
  • 2. What does this Privacy Policy cover?
  • 3. What Personal Information do we collect from you?
  • 4. Cookies
  • 5. How do we use Personal Information collected from you?
  • 6. Who do we share your Personal Information with?
  • 7. Our legal grounds for processing Personal Information
  • 8. Where is your Personal Information stored and processed?
  • 9. How long do we keep your Personal Information?
  • 10. How do we secure your Personal Information?
  • 11. Changes to this Privacy Policy
  • 12. Your rights
  • 13. Contacting us, further questions and how to make a complaint

1. Overview

This is the Website and App Privacy Policy ("Privacy Policy") of the UK registered branch of CookScope Inc., a corporation registered at 4-20-3 Ebisu, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo, Japan ("CookScope") and we are the data controller in respect of the Personal Information (as defined below) that we collect from you. It covers information CookScope collects from users and visitors of our official website ("Site") and official mobile app ("App").

By accessing our Site or App, you confirm that you have read and understood the entirety of this Privacy Policy.

You have various rights in respect of our use of your Personal Information as set out in t he 'Your Rights' section below. Two of the fundamental rights to be aware of are that you may:

  1. ask us to stop using your Personal Information for direct-marketing by email or push notification. If you exercise this right, we will stop using your Personal Information in this regard; and
  2. ask us to consider any valid objections you have to our use of your Personal Information where we process your Personal Information on the basis of our, or a third party's, legitimate interests.
)
